page.title: 09INDUSTRY IN BISHOPS FROME
page.content: Being mainly a rural area, the principle industry is agriculture (see farming). There is a small industrial estate in Bishops Frome where Frank Hodges and Son manufacture buckets for mechanical excavators, providing employment for 14. Also 4 people at Holden Heating are involved in the research and development of totally automated solid fuel domestic heating systems. When the development is complete, manufacture of these systems will then take place in Bishops Frome, increasing employment opportunities.
